Package com.teracloud.streams.topology.spl

Interface SPLWindow

All Superinterfaces:
SPLInput, TopologyElement, TWindow<com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple,Object>
public interface SPLWindow extends TWindow<com.ibm.streams.operator.Tuple,Object>, SPLInput
An SPL window, that has an SPL eviction policy and an SPL trigger policy.
